evidence.claim: Welocalize uses AWS and Azure for cloud services to facilitate translation and localization operations.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations for handling health-related data.
Welocalize supports EDI transactions, including X12 standards, for efficient data exchange in healthcare.
Integration with FHIR APIs enhances data sharing across healthcare systems.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse services found.
